meanings.definition: Cassingles: plural noun, a type of music format consisting of a single song on a cassette tape.
meanings.sent1: I found some old cassingles in the attic.
meanings.sent2: Back in the day, people used to buy cassingles for their favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The cassingles were so tiny, they looked like mini music treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of cassingles was a time capsule of 90s music.
meanings.sent5: The cassingles brought back memories of simpler times.

meanings.definition: Cassingles: verb, to release or purchase music in the form of a single song on a cassette tape.
meanings.sent1: She decided to cassingles her latest track for a retro feel.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the band to cassingles their new hit.
meanings.sent3: The artist cassingled the song as a quirky throwback to the past.
meanings.sent4: In a digital age, he chose to cassingles his music on tapes for a unique touch.
meanings.sent5: Cassingling the song added a vintage charm to the release.
